title: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back
writers:
Leigh Brackett, 
Lawrence Kasdan,
George Lucas
actors:
Mark Hamill,
Harrison Ford,
Carrie Fisher
shortDescription: After the Rebels are overpowered by the Empire, Luke Skywalker begins his Jedi training with Yoda, while his friends are pursued across the galaxy by Darth Vader and bounty hunter Boba Fett.

title: The Matrix
actors:
Keanu Reaves,
Laurence Fishburne,
Carrie-Anne Moss
shortDescription: When a beautiful stranger leads computer hacker Neo to a forbidding underworld, he discovers the shocking truth--the life he knows is the elaborate deception of an evil cyber-intelligence.

title: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope
actors:
Mark Hamill,
Harrison Ford,
Carrie Fisher
shortDescription: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a Wookiee and two droids to save the galaxy from the Empire's world-destroying battle station, while also attempting to rescue Princess Leia from the mysterious Darth Vader.

title: Back to the Future
actors:
Michael J. Fox,
Christopher Lloyd,
Lea Thompson
shortDescription: Marty McFly, a 17-year-old high school student, is accidentally sent 30 years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his close friend, the maverick scientist Doc Brown.

title: Alien
actors:
Sigourney Weaver,
Tom Skerritt,
John Hurt
shortDescription: The crew of a commercial spacecraft encounter a deadly lifeform after investigating an unknown transmission.

title: Raiders of th Lost Ark
writers:
Lawrence Kasdan, 
George Lucas, 
Philip Kaufman
actors:
Harrison Ford, 
Karen Allen,
Paul Freeman
shortDescription: In 1936, archaeologist and adventurer Indiana Jones is hired by the U.S. government to find the Ark of the Covenant before the Nazis can obtain its awesome powers.

title: Blade Runner
writers:
Hampton Fancher, 
David Webb Peoples, 
Philip K. Dick
actors:
Harrison Ford, 
Rutger Hauer, 
Sean Young
shortDescription: A blade runner must pursue and terminate four replicants who stole a ship in space and have returned to Earth to find their creator.

title: The Terminator
writers:
James Cameron,
Gale Anne Hurd,
William Wisher
actors:
Arnold Schwarzenegger, 
Linda Hamilton, 
Michael Biegn
shortDescription: A human soldier is sent from 2029 to 1984 to stop an almost indestructible cyborg killing machine, sent from the same year, which has been programmed to execute a young woman whose unborn son is the key to humanity's future salvation.

title: The Princess Bride
actors:
Cary Elwes,
Mandy Patinkin,
Robin Wright
shortDescription: A bedridden boy's grandfather reads him the story of a farmboy-turned-pirate who encounters numerous obstacles, enemies and allies in his quest to be reunited with his true love.

title: Star Trek II: The Wrath of Khan
writers:
Gene Roddenberry,
Jack B. Sowards,
Harve Bennett
actors:
William Shatner,
Leonard Nimoy,
DeForest Kelley
shortDescription: With the assistance of the Enterprise crew, Admiral Kirk must stop an old nemesis, Khan Noonien Singh, from using the life-generating Genesis Device as the ultimate weapon.

title: 3 Idiots
actors: Aamir Khan, Kareena Kapoor
shortDescription: 3 Idiots is heartwarming comedy-drama that follows the journey of three friends in an engineering college as they navigate societal pressure, unconventional education , and the pursuit of their dreams.

title: Bahubali: The Beginning
actors: Piranhas, Daggubati
shortDescription: Set I the fictional kingdom of Mahishmati, the movie follows the journey of a young warrior who discover his true identity and fights again the injustice and tyranny.

title: Mughal-e-Azam
actors: Dilip Kumar, Madhubala
shortDescription: Set in the Mughal era , this epic tale depicts the forbidden love between Prince Salim and the beautiful court dancer , Anarkali, leading to a monumental clash of loyalties.

title: Golmaal: Fun Unlimited
actors: Ajay Devgn, Arched Warsi, Tussar Kapoor, Sherman Joshi
shortDescription: Golmaal: Fun Unlimited is a hilarious comedy about group of friends who find themselves entangled in a web of misunderstandings , mistaken identities, and chaotic situations, leading to riotous laughter.

title: Ghajini
actors:
Aamir Khan
Asin Thottumkal
shortDescription: Ghajini is a gripping tale of a man with anterograde amnesia seeking revenge for the murder of his loved ones. As he hunts down the culprits , he relies on Polaroid photographs and tattoos to remember key details.

title: Black
actors:
Amitabh Bachchan, 
Rani Mukerji
shortDescription: Based on the life of a deaf-blind women, Michelle McNally, the film explores her relationship with her teacher , who helps her overcome obstacles and discover her potential.

title: Veer-Zaara
actors:
Shah Rukh Khan 
Rani Mukerji, Pretty Zinta
shortDescription: Veer-Zaara is an epic romance that transcends borders and time. It portrays the emotional journey of Veer and Zara, two individuals from different nations, as they face societal barriers and fight for their love.

title: Dil Chahta Hai
actors:
Aamir Khan, 
Saif Ali Khan 
Akshaye Khan
shortDescription: Dil Chata Hai revolves around the lives of three friends who navigate the complexities of love, friendship and personal growth. The film explores themes of camaraderie, heart-break, and self-discovery.

title: Sholay
actors:
Amitabh Bachchan
Dharmender
shortDescription: Two criminals Veeru and Jay , are hired by a retired police officer to capture the ruthless dacoit Gabbar Singh in the village of Ramgarh.

title: Angrej
actors:
Amrinder Gill, Ammy Virk
Sargon Mehta, Aditi Sharma
shortDescription: Angrejâ€™ is a heartwarming romantic comedy set in village pre-partitioned Punjab. It follows the story of anger , a young man caught between traditional values and modernity, and his journey to find true love.
